title: Gone Adventuring!
content:
Today my 4 cousins (Nathalie, Denise, Justin, and Eric) and I are headed off on our trip to Hong Kong, Cambodia and Thailand. When we first booked our tickets it felt like this adventure would never get here, but here it finally is! It took me forever to finish packing, and aside from all the gifts, malaria meds, and wet naps I'm bringing, I ended up packing really light on the clothes front. For the next three weeks, I plan on wearing lots of simple cotton tanks, long cut-offs, and this retro-looking bathing suit I picked up from Target. I also went a little crazy at the Victoria's Secret semi-annual sale, but at least I'll have lots of clean undies for the entire trip!

I hope everyone has a wonderful January. I'll be back on the 31st with lots of fun pictures and stories to share from my trip. Until then, I've scheduled a few "to eat" posts for the next three Mondays, so check back if you'd like :)
